page.name: LINCS Survey - Intro-Assessment-ABE
page.content:
Congratulations! Upon completing this LINCS course, we invite you to complete an evaluation survey. Your input is really valuable to us. We will use your feedback to improve LINCS trainings and professional development.

It typically takes 5 minutes to complete the survey. Your answers are completely anonymous and will be analyzed in combination with the answers of other course takers. Participation is voluntary.

Click here to start the survey: http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/3972149/Introduction-to-Assessment-for-Adult-Education

Should you have any questions about this survey, please contact Marilia Mochelmmochel@manhattanstrategy.com or
Jessie Stadd jstadd@manhattanstrategy.com. 

We appreciate your time and input.

Thank you,

The LINCS Team
